{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.19741v1", "title": "Optimal Stopping of a Brownian Excursion and an $α$-dimensional
  Bessel Bridge", "summary": "We study the optimal stopping of an $\alpha$-dimensional Bessel bridge for
the payoff $\phi(x)=x^n$, where $\alpha,n>0$. As a special case we consider the
Brownian excursion with the identity function as the payoff ($\alpha=3,n=1$).
For the Brownian excursion we can give an explicit solution but in the general
case we provide a complete solution via a power series expansion.", "main_category": "math.PR", "categories": "math.PR", "published": "2025-04-28T12:40:59Z"}
